column1: Uchi////We ordered 10-course chef's special for 2 people ($195+tax+tip). Food was tasty
column2: but the portion is very little. Each dish was around 4 bites
column3: shared by two people. I am happy that we had a little bit of a variety of food
column12: rich in citrus and excellent blend of herbs and fruits. The dessert was unique as well - peanut ice cream. Because the portion is small
column13: we finished every course within 1 minute and kept drinking a lot of water while waiting for next dish.
